resources.string:
In today's world, there are hundreds, if not thousands of different programming languages. Each of them has its own advantages and disadvantages, which are not always obvious. That's why for a person who wants to become a developer, it is super difficult or even impossible to decide which language to choose.

To solve this problem, I made a short interactive test, which will help to determine, which programming language is the best for you ‚ò∫

Just tell me your name and we can begin!
What do you want to develop?
Where do you want to work?
How much time are you willing to spend on training?
Are you ready to constantly learn something new?
What do you think is better? With what would you like to work?
Programs and games for tablets and smartphones
I am in College or University
Studying, but missing a lot of classes:3
I want to become a freelancer and work for myself
Simple work and relatively low salary at the beginning
Complicated, but interesting and highly paid work
Something moderate, I don\'t want to do something complicated, but I also don\'t want to do something too boring
I\'m ready to meditate for years, my mantra will be language manuals, and I will reach zen üßò
Not very much, I want to start working and earning as soon as possible
Long, but no more than a couple years
Yes, I\'m always ready to be in a trend
I need a language in which everything will be stable
I want to be in trend, but I don\'t want to be getting updates every day
Yes, I already know one or more programming language
Yes, I have some understanding how computers work
I am a guru at programming, and I am here just to look at your ridiculous test app
Whet? I don\'t know what is this. Show me the results!
Who do you think you will become?

%s, you would be an excellent system programmer! It is a specialist who develops operating systems, interfaces to distributed databases, and works with networks. Developers of this category are the rarest and highly paid.

In order to become a true "system programmer", you will need to learn the language C.
Here is a link where you can start searching how to learn it yourself ‚ò∫

%s, the test showed that the development of the backend is in your blood. In this area, a huge stack of various technologies is used, but PHP in conjunction with MySQL - the most often.\nHere is a link where you can start searching how to learn it yourself ‚ò∫

%s, according to the results of the test, you would have become an excellent front-end programmer! This is a specialist whose task is to create and support the client side of the website - everything that you see in the browser.

To become a front-line soldier, you need to learn JavaScript - a modern and dynamically developing language with a huge community.
Here is a link where you can start searching how to learn it yourself ‚ò∫

%s, the test showed that Java is just what you need. This programming language is used to write a wide variety of programs,and lately for writing applications for Android (Like in this Udacity course ‚ô•).\nHere is a link where you can start searching how to learn it yourself ‚ò∫

%s, according to the test results, Python is the best for you. This is a universal language that can be used in almost any field - scientific modeling, data processing, writing application logic, automated testing, scripts for deploying infrastructure, and much more!\nHere is a link where you can start searching how to learn it yourself ‚ò∫
